boardgame.name: The Korean War
boardgame.description: An operational level simulation of the first year of the conflict for control of the Korean peninsula, from the first North Korean attack, through UN-forces invasion of Inchon and the subsequent drive into North Korea that unleashed the Chinese counter attack._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1986 Charles S. Roberts Best Graphic Presentation in an Adventure Game Winner
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Podcast #13 Roger Miller Revolution Games Interview

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Two copies both unpunched. One in Mint condition £25 One MInt inside some wear to the box £20
Never played, counters unpunched, box a little scuffed
Contents are unpunched and in excellent condition. The box shows some shelf ware.
The counters have been cut out, but I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t believe the game was ever actually played. There is no counter tray--I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t remember if it ever had one.

No box, complete game, pieces in ziplock bags.
Two split ends on box, otherwise in excellent condition. Let me know if you would like a photo. P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P charged at cost. Will add 5% to total cost for payment by PayPal.

Punched, in very good condition, some wear on the box. Missing six counters, of all which are not crucial to the game: 3 VP Counters (x1, x10, x100), 1 UN/NK Control marker (of 12), 1 North Korean Initiative level, and 1 blank.
Unpunched, but missing 3 US Replacement counters. Box bottom has some splitting.
The game is as bought and has never been played, including unpunched pieces, the only issue is one of the corners is split. The cost of postage, packing etc will be £5 in the UK.

CONDITION: Excellent condition overall, the contents are used and complete, with unpunched counters. There is a 3/4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; tear to one edge of one of the maps - I tore it while inspecting the game! The box has light shelfwear and creasing and a price tag on the cover, but is sound with no split corners (see photo). POSTAGE COST: UK postage: £5.50 European Postage: £8.00 Rest of World Postage: £15.50 Any buyers in and around London are welcome to collect in person (cash on collection). COMBINED SHIPPING: I will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible. Please note that it is NOT always cheaper to combine shipping on games outside the UK due to the weight limit of 2KG on the Small Packet service. As a rough approximation, outside the UK it is usually cheaper to combine 5 or more games, while 4 or less are best sent individually. This depends entirely on the specific games - please contact me before buying if you wish to purchase multiple games so that I can give you an accurate shipping cost. ABOUT ME: I have been playing and collecting games for over 25 years and I also sell games and magazines on ebay with the same username (saabdastard) where I have a 100% positive rating and a feedback score of over 4000. I am a verified PAYPAL Premier account holder (since 2004), with over 650 PayPal Verified Buyers. SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Please wait until you receive my invoice before sending payment. Payment is due within 5 days of the date you receive my invoice. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: UK buyers may use PayPal, cheque or cash-on-collection. Overseas buyers MUST USE PAYPAL only. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. Europe and Rest of World rates shown above are for Airmail. Surface Mail rate to Rest of World is available if you wish (same as Europe Air rate), but Surface Mail to Rest of World can take up to 2 months! There is no real difference between Air and Surface rates for Europe. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. Failure to take out optional insurance limits my liability for loss or damage in the mail to the amount automatically covered by Royal Mail (currently £39 per package for Small Packets, £150 for International Standard). CUSTOMS: Buyers outside the EU are responsible for all Customs charges applicable to their country. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange or refund within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization from me BEFORE returning the item.
Punched

99% unpunched. Never played. Excellent condition. Storage tray. Articles from _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The Wargamer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Paper Wars_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Hate to sell, but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m out of space!

Game box has some edge, corner and shelfwear. Game materials are in very good condition. Game is partially punched. I have counted all the counters and they are present. All other game materials (maps, rules, reference sheet) are present except for the 10 sided dice. Shipping is $10 to the U.S., otherwise inquire.
Unpunched, 10 counters fell out but they are stored in the counter tray. Minor shelf wear for a game 24 years old. Game is unplayed. *I ship fast and can combine shipping. Thanks!

partial punched and appears unplayed. rul;es booklet is like new, as are the counters (verified complete - I have a spare parts copy also like new but for the fubar box). Maps appear unfolded but a time or two.

Excellent condition. Shrinkwrap removed just to check everything was there. free postage withing the Uk and discount to Europe and the rest of the world. Paypal and cheques from the UK and Paypal only from everywhere else.

The game looks to be in excellent condition. About 10% of the counters have been punched and are in trays, the rest have been undisturbed. I would guess it was never played (I am not the original owner). The only damage is slight shelf wearing and age, as well as someone taped the box shut at some point, I did not take the tape off as I was worried it would damage the box. I will ship worldwide at buyers expense or can do face to face in Toronto/GTA.

For user: HuginnGreiling Game is in very good condition and has been verified as complete. It appears the NK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; UN player charts/tables and the game turn record have been carefully removed from the instruction booklet but are in great condition with no rips or writing on them. All 520 counters are present and have been punched and stored in a counter tray. Also comes with 2 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;x32_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; mapsheets, 8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;x11_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; player aid card, 10 sided die, and rulebooklet (clean - no rips, writing or other markings. Box shows a little wear (dishing to the box top, shelf wear) but overall good shape with no split corners.

93 counters punched and clipped, 93 counters verified in the tray. Contents verified complete and in excellent condition. The only issue I found was some slight yellow highlighter marks on the front cover of the rule book. I have no idea why as there is no highlighter on the inside of the rule book. Someone was doodling. Box is square and straight. Goodly amount of edge and shelf wear. Couple of corners rubbed hard but intact and square. Its not a beauty but a really nice players copy. My husband was an avid gamer and board game collector. He passed away and now it is time for me to find new homes for all his games. He took excellent care of all the games, if they were played, no one was allowed to eat or drink while playing. The games have been stored in a smoke free environment. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thank you!
